verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: Thou art to pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, to go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than thyself, cities <S%H5892><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and fenced up <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>,

A people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakims <S%H6062><s%>, whom thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and of whom thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> say, Who can stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> !

Understand <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therefore this day <S%H3117><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is he which goeth over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; as a consuming <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> he shall destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and he shall bring them down <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8686><s%> before thy face <S%H6440><s%>: so shalt thou drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them quickly <S%H4118><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee.

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thou in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, after that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath cast them out <S%H1920><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, For my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath brought me in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this land <S%H776><s%>: but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8688><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

Not for thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, dost thou go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>: but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8688><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and that he may perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, Avraham <S%H85><s%>, Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

Understand <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therefore, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee not this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it for thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>; for thou art a stiffnecked <S%H6203><s%> <S%H7186><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, how thou provokedst the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou didst depart out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, until ye came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>, ye have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8688><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Also in Horev <S%H2722><s%> ye provoked <S%H7107><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, so that the YY <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with you to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you.

When I was gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with you, then I abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>, I neither did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8804><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>:

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; and on them was written according to all the words <S%H1697><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get thee down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from hence; for thy people <S%H5971><s%> which thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> themselves; they are quickly <S%H4118><s%> turned aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them; they have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them a molten image <S%H4541><s%>.

Furthermore the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked <S%H6203><s%> <S%H7186><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>:

Let me alone <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: and I will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of <S%H854><s%> thee a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater <S%H7227><s%> than they.

So I turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and the mount <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in my two <S%H8147><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And I looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, ye had sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>: ye had turned aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you.

And I took <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them out of <S%H5921><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And I fell down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>, forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>: I did neither eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8804><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, because of all your sins <S%H2403><s%> which ye sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, in doing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> wickedly <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

For I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>, wherewith the YY <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against you to destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you. But the YY <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me at that time <S%H6471><s%> also.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H599><s%> <S%H8694><s%> with Aharon <S%H175><s%> to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him: and I prayed <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for Aharon <S%H175><s%> also the same time <S%H6256><s%>.

And I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%>, the calf <S%H5695><s%> which ye had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>, and stamped <S%H3807><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and ground <S%H2912><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it very small <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, even until it was as small <S%H1854><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as dust <S%H6083><s%>: and I cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into the brook <S%H5158><s%> that descended out <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>.
And at Taberah <S%H8404><s%>, and at Massah <S%H4532><s%>, and at Kibrothhattaavah <S%H6914><s%>, ye provoked the YY <S%H3068><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

Likewise when the YY <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you from Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you; then ye rebelled <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and ye believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him not, nor hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to his voice <S%H6963><s%>.
Ye have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8688><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you.

Thus I fell down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>, as I fell down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8694><s%> at the first; because the YY <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you.

I prayed <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> therefore unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8804><s%> through thy greatness <S%H1433><s%>, which thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Avraham <S%H85><s%>, Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; look <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not unto the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, nor to their wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, nor to their sin <S%H2403><s%>:

Lest the land <S%H776><s%> whence thou broughtest us out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Because the YY <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, and because he hated <S%H8135><s%> them, he hath brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

Yet they are thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou broughtest out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> by thy mighty <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by thy stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>.
